column2: Help Zippti's golems with their experiments, fight the skritt, knock over their shinies, and activate tracking devices to monitor their response.
You've helped Zippti greatly in her research.
Repair signs, light torches, and keep the road free of dangers. Destroy troll trophy spikes, poison troll food, and drive trolls away.
Spin around, Reflecting projectiles and throwing daggers that Cripple nearby foes.

Glyph. Summon an elemental based on your attunement.
Fire Elemental: Deals damage.
Ice Elemental: Deals damage and heals.
Earth Elemental: Deals damage and is hard to kill.
Air Elemental: Deals damage and Stuns.

The Vigil Keep curently houses one of the necromancer Rissa's amulets, which means a horde of undead will soon be knocking on the Keep's front door. Gahn Towerbreaker is waiting at the keep for you to join in its defense.

The Durmand Priory may have a device that can track and locate the necromancer Rissa's amulets. Yahala Scribepaw is standing by to field-test the device, but she needs your help to conduct the test safely. The closer you get to the amulets, the closer you get to tracking down Rissa...and your fallen warband member Howl.

The Durmand Priory has the know-how to find and destroy Rissa's amulets, but they don't have the muscle to make it happen. That's where you and your new order the Vigil come in. The final showdown with Rissa is at hand...and so are answers about Howl the Brazen's ultimate fate.

The Durmand Priory has the know-how to find and destroy Rissa's amulets, which is part of the reason you chose to join them permanently. The final showdown with Rissa is at hand...and so are answers about the ultimate fate of Howl the Brazen.

The Durmand Priory has the know-how to find and destroy Rissa's amulets, and they're counting on the Vigil to protect them while they do it. Your new order, the Order of Whispers, doesn't trust the others, so you're standing by to get the job done if they fall short. The final showdown with Rissa is at hand...and so are answers about Howl the Brazen's ultimate fate.
Experiment on inactive golems, repair golem control panels, subdue haywire golems, and organize toolboxes along the road and inside nearby labs.
Activate storm cloud generators and energy storage containers, and remove roaming sparks from the lab.
Speak with Kaii to test his protogolem then examine electrical distortions and report back. Repair and revive SCRAP 80-Ts.
Reviving allies can turn the tide of a battle. Help out your team by reviving the fallen.
Just because an enemy is down doesn't mean they're out of the fight. Finish off your foes!
Obtain a colored key card from Takka then chromatize flowers with observation turrets and defeat their oozes.
Bring Blopp lush kelp, defeat Inquest, neutralize poisonous ampoules, and defeat crazed hylek.
Blopp thanks you for aiding in his fight against the Inquest.
Find and disrupt the nearby Inquest lab, collect data crystals, and question suspicious salvage specialists.
Kill oozes, break ooze containers, and help protesters.
Recover gate pieces, cull hostile wildlife, and defeat skritt bothering Parnna.
Clean up chaotic material, kill irradiated rats and chaos beasts, and get the skritt to stop collecting chaotic material.
The krewe thanks you for your help.
Take out Inquest operatives, sabotage their broken golems and their experiments, destroy lab equipment, and rescue prisoners.

This rare salvage tool never runs out of charges. It can break an unlimited number of items down into their base components.
25%% chance of rarer materials. 80%% chance of recovering upgrades. Costs 60 copper per use.
<c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous necromancer, Verata.</c>

Hurl the rocks from your barrier at your foe.

Congratulations! You've learned how to spend glory.

—Glory Master

Congratulations! You've learned about tournaments.

—Tournament Master

Congratulations! You've learned about siege weapons.

—Siege Master

Congratulations! You've learned how to fight underwater.

—Underwater Combat Master

Congratulations! You've learned what kinds of enemies you may encounter on the battlefield.

—Combat Master
Contains a gold coin, luck, a magic find booster, and various bandit supplies. Usable as a bag after opening.
Unlocks the Bandit Weapons Specialist collection.
Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.
Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Sinister stat combination.
